title: Floating rice
creator_credit: Arch Nicholson, Thanom Soongnarata, John Morris and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description:
Episode of Series “Our Asian Neighbours: Thailand”.
The simple way of life of the people in the central plains of Thailand and their method of cultivating rice is shown through the wet and dry season.
creator_credit_for_label: Arch Nicholson, Thanom Soongnarata, John Morris and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
